# Part 1: T-tests
Mass comparison between male & female chinstrap penguins

```{r}
#Exploring
chinstraps <- penguins %>% 
  filter(species=="Chinstrap")

#Basic plots, Histograms
ggplot(data=chinstraps, aes(x=body_mass_g)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=10)+
  facet_wrap(~sex)

#Basic plot, QQ Plot
ggplot(data=chinstraps, aes(sample=body_mass_g))+
  geom_qq()+
  facet_wrap(~sex)

#Descriptive stats
chinstraps %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  summarise(
    mean_mass=mean(body_mass_g),
    median_mass=median(body_mass_g),
    sd_mass=sd(body_mass_g),
    sample_size=n()
  )
```
